fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Russell Brunson; Jim Edwards, etc.
Ex: Co-Creator of Click Funnels; Best Selling Author; Funnel Hacker, etc.
Ex: sales copywriting; for sale by owner, dog training, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Who is your target audience for this freebie (PLURAL)?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: for sale by owners; dog trainers; funnel hackers, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: Name / Title of the freebie they are requesting

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: 5 Keys To A Best Seller; 3 Quick Funnel Copy Hacks, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: WHAT is the actual freebie they are requesting

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: report; video; webinar replay, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What's the big payoff of the freebie they are requesting? (VERB)

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: create sales copy that gets people to buy NOW; write your own ebook in a week; avoid getting held hostage by a your web designer or tech person; create amazing sales copy in a flash, etc

fields.fieldTitle: What is the download URL for the freebie they've requested?
What is a URL you want them to check out after the freebie?
Catchy "tagline" statement that goes with your business

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: How to write amazing sales copy... WITHOUT writing!; How to sell your house yourself and SAVE the commission!
